name: waste sorting game
description:
This game is a waste sorting theme.
As you play, you will learn where to put waste.

Controls

compiutermouse buttons and wheelsmart phonetouch

How To Play

English :
your task is to click only on the messages with rubbish which can be picked up by garbage truck
Lietuviškai:
tavo užduotis yra paspausti tik tuos pranešimus, kuriuose pavaizduotos šiukšles kurias gali paimti dabar esant šiukšliaveže
